115//
117//
118typedef enum
119{
120 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_FLASH_CACHE_INVALIDATE = 1,
121 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_STATISTICS_RESET,
122 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_FLASH_ALL_SLEEP_ENABLE,
123 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_FLASH_ALL_SLEEP_DISABLE,
124 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_FLASH0_SLEEP_ENABLE,
125 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_FLASH0_SLEEP_DISABLE,
126 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_FLASH1_SLEEP_ENABLE,
127 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_FLASH1_SLEEP_DISABLE,
128 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_MONITOR_ENABLE,
129 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_MONITOR_DISABLE,
130 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_LPMMODE_RESET,
131 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_LPMMODE_RECOMMENDED,
132 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_LPMMODE_AGGRESSIVE,
133 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_LPMMODE_SET,
134 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_SEDELAY_SET,
135 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_RDWAIT_SET,
136 // Configure up to two non-cacheable regions
137 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONTROL_NC_CFG,
138} am_hal_cachectrl_control_e;

142//
143typedef enum

147 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONFIG_MODE_INSTR,

149 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_CONFIG_MODE_INSTR_DATA

197} am_hal_cachectrl_config_t;
